scripts.preinstall: if [ "$SKIP_PREINSTALL" != "true" ]; then node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('pnpm') === -1) throw new Error('You must use pnpm to install dependencies')"; else echo 'Skipping preinstall script'; fi
scripts.build-common: pnpm generate-styles && pnpm generate-icons-list && pnpm build-sass && pnpm prettier:fix .
scripts.build: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm update-import-for-mixin && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm update-import-for-mixin && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm update-import-for-mixin && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm update-import-for-mixin && pnpm generate-declarations

scripts.build:prod: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm update-import-for-mixin && pnpm generate-declarations

scripts.lint: pnpm lint-js "**/*.{mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && pnpm lint-css "**/*.{css,scss}" && pnpm prettier .
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm lint-js:fix "**/*.{mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && pnpm lint-css:fix "**/*.{css,scss}" && pnpm prettier:fix .
scripts.storybook: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:visualizer: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:buildStats: pnpm build && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook dev -p 6006
